definition: white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera

sentences.english: You should know better than to behave like that.
sentences.chinese: 你应当明白事理，不该那么不懂规矩。

sentences.english: She was about the only person there who knew better than to kill animals.
sentences.chinese: 她是那里唯一一个明白事理，不杀生的人。

sentences.english: I'll make him study and understand things.
sentences.chinese: 我会让他学习，明白事理。

sentences.english: Your father is more understanding than mine by far.
sentences.chinese: 你父亲远比我父亲更明白事理。

definition: banquet where guests arrive at various times and are served with food as they arrive
to celebrate a birthday (of an elderly person)
to attend a funeral/to take part in a funeral procession
generous care but a thrifty funeral/to look after one's parents generously, but not waste money on a lavish funeral
